issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

fields.summary: When creating a volume using equallogic in HA topology:  Failed to marshall response

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Volume creation fails: com.eucalyptus.ws.WebServicesException: Failed to marshall response

comments.body:
I can't reproduce this against current 3.3 dev ("testing")

This is what I get when either max vol size or total vol size is exceeded.

CreateVolumeType: Failed to send message CreateStorageVolumeType to service StorageInternal because: Max Volume Size Limit Exceeded volume: vol-B8ED42B9

CreateVolumeType: Failed to send message CreateStorageVolumeType to service StorageInternal because: Total Volume Size Limit Exceeded volume: vol-ED723D38
Cannot reproduce with a local SC. Retrying with a remote SC.
